name: Vinny Longo

jv_history.source_quote:
, Mike Dijan, Tom Sheehan, our special guest co-host Dan Seely, Producer ... 20% OFF @manscaped + Free Shipping with promo code HARDLORE at MANSCAPED.com! #ad #manscapedpod 

FOLLOW VINNIE STIGMA:

what_you_do: Transforms moms into fitness models by teaching them how to prioritize themselves. Also mentors fitness professionals, coaches, and entrepreneurs to help them achieve wild success.
who_you_serve: Moms, fitness professionals, coaches, and entrepreneurs.
offering: Resources, knowledge, and a supportive community to help clients transform their bodies and lives. Also offers business and wellness coaching to help fitness professionals and entrepreneurs take their businesses to the next level.
social_proof: As featured in STRONG Magazine and Side Fitness Magazine.
signature_programs: STRONG Formula - a 16-week course teaching how to take clients through a successful body transformation while working on your own personal transformation journey.
business_focus: Helping moms transform their bodies and lives, and mentoring fitness professionals and entrepreneurs to grow their businesses.
service_provided: 1-on-1 coaching, online programs, nutrition guidance, meal planning, weight management, training programs
